{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokemon Mansion |image = |caption = An overhead map of the Pokemon Mansion. |tokens = 1,500 |location = West of Cinnabar Island }} '''Pokémon Mansion''' is a dungeon in [[Kanto]].
==Details==

{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health !! Base Health (Boss) !! Egg Steps Given |- | General || 17760 || 88000 || 35 |}
===Pokémon===
* Growlithe * Vulpix * Grimer * Muk * Koffing * Weezing * Magmar (boss)
